pinyin: tian1 ti3 wu4 li3 xue2 jia1

sentences.english: The previously known most distant object was a short-lived gamma ray burst.
sentences.chinese: 之前所知最遙遠的天體是一次短期的伽瑪射線暴。

sentences.english: Anomalous refraction is believed to be the main error source for classical astrometry.
sentences.chinese: 反常折射已成爲傳統天體測量學的主要誤差來源。

sentences.english: That massive object acts as a gravitational lens.
sentences.chinese: 這種超級天體如同一個引力透鏡。

sentences.english: It is well known that accretion disks are hydrodynamic disks with anomalous viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 天體物理吸積盤是具有反常粘滯的流體盤。

sentences.english: The device was also probably used to predict solar eclipses and indicate other planetary motions.
sentences.chinese: 這一裝置也有可能被用來預測日食和其他天體活動。

sentences.english: Are these indications of a fragment of the Tunguska body?
sentences.chinese: 這些現象是否代表那裏埋著通古斯卡撞擊天體的碎片？

sentences.english: Even today, the influence of the heavens on the days of the week is unmistakable.
sentences.chinese: 即使今天也不會有人弄錯天體對一週內的七天的影響。

sentences.english: This is the website of the Astrochemistry Laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 這是天體化學實驗室的網站。

sentences.english: Take celestial azimuth and find compass error on each watch if the weather is fine.
sentences.chinese: 如天氣好，每一班測取天體方位求出羅經差。

sentences.english: Favorite hobbies include archeology, archery, astrophysics, flamenco dancing, and designing clothes.
sentences.chinese: 考古，射箭，天體物理，弗拉明戈舞和服裝設計。

sentences.english: NASA appears to know something about this red cometary orb.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局似乎知道這個紅色慧星天體的東西。

sentences.english: Person finally will become greenery be the ephemeris normal regulation.
sentences.chinese: 人終究會成爲綠葉就是天體的正常規律。

sentences.english: On day four, The heavenly bodies that give off light by day or night are created.
sentences.chinese: 在第四天，那些在白天或者晚上發光的天體被創造了。

sentences.english: The gym did its research before opting to chase the nudist euro.
sentences.chinese: 健身房在向天體主義者的歐元招手前，做過調查。

sentences.english: But the role played by the heavens in formalizing the days of the week doesn't stop there.
sentences.chinese: 但天體對星期的形成所起的作用可並不止這些。

sentences.english: Elenin is a very dangerous cosmic object.
sentences.chinese: Elenin是一個非常危險的天體。
